mapper.select: select w.nick_name,w.avatar_url,g.* from comment as g inner join wx_user as w on g.openid = w.openid where g.goods_id = #{goodsId}

SELECT c.*,u.avatar_url,u.nick_name,gs.dish_name,gs.dish_image FROM comment as c inner join wx_user as u on c.openid = u.openid inner join dish_table as gs on gs.dish_id = c.goods_id order by c.create_time desc
